description:
A sword given to you by the Solus Town Village
Headman. It's light, making it easier to wield.
name: Squire Sword
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A simple wand created by Matilda. It's pretty
much just an enchanted stick.
name: Apprentice Wand
note:
<Can Sell>
<Weapon Image: 39>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Mage
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A well-carved wooden staff. It's not too strong,
but it makes a good first Cleric's weapon.
name: Training Staff
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A dagger handcrafted by a rogue. It's lacking
in strength, but easy to conceal... huh?
name: Novice Dagger
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A small, cheap sword. An asset for any traveler
that doesn't have access to better weapons.
name: Traveler Sword

description: It's a soldier's spear. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier's Spear
note:
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
class: Soldier
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A basic wand useful for magic learners, although
it looks remarkably similar to a normal stick.
name: Traveler Wand
note: <Weapon Image: 39>

description:
A small axe that is easy to wield and is mainly
used for chopping wood. Not very good in combat.
name: Woodcutting Axe
note:
<Disassembler: Axe>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A wand with cool orb on its end. The orb is what
gives the staff its magical properties.
name: Orb Wand
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 121>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Mage
</Equip Requirement>

description:
An upgrade from the \iw[1]. It feels
steady in your hands, and has a slight sheen.
name: Bronze Sword
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 207>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
It's similar to the \iw[9], just longer. A
stronger alternative to the \iw[3].
name: Orb Staff
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 121>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A small hammer mainly used for fixing stuff.
It can also be used in combat, I guess.
name: Light Hammer
note:
<Weapon Image: 52>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A typical dagger used a Bandito. It still
needs some training to be usable.
name: Bandito Dagger
note:
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A tough blade crafted with steel imported from
Telluria. The spikes on it have a huge damage boost.
name: Steel Sword
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 254>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A dagger hand-designed by Bob and James. It's easy
to carry and conceal, and packs quite a punch.
name: Swift
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 253>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A wand with a wood core enforced with enchanted
silver. Dishes out huge magic damage!
name: Silver Wand
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 115>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Mage
</Equip Requirement>

description:
It's a staff made of steel. Nothing too special,
right? Well, that's where the magic comes in.
name: Steel Staff
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 258>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
An archaic and once very strong blade, 'till Andy spilled
some cider on it. It can probably be restored, though...
name: Bloodlust
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 206>
<Cannot Discard>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
"Sometimes they see you before you can get to 'em. That's
when you get up close and personal." Can confuse enemies.
name: Andy's Dusters
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 238>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A staff imbued with the passion of two lovers. Magnifies the
user's healing capabilities and restores HP when attacking.
name: Passion
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 209>
<HP Life Steal Physical: +5%>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
Steadier and sheenier (?) than the \iw[10].
A throwback to old times, and a solid weapon.
name: Bronze Sword ★
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 207>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Bronze Sword: 1
Bronze Alloy: 3
Steel Alloy: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Bronze Sword ★>

description:
A peculiarly powerful branch. A construct this weak
should not be able to house this much magic, yet it does.
name: Enchanted Stick
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 39>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Mage
</Equip Requirement>

<Synthesis Ingredients>
Stick: 1
Bark: 15
Worn Cloth: 5
MAT Scroll: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>
<Mask Name: Enchanted Stick>

description:
A powerful upgrade to the \iw[21]. It offers extreme offensive
abilities, but greatly reduced agility. Requires two hands to use.
name: Bronze Greatsword
note:
<Upgrade Slots: 1>
<Weapon Image: 92>
<twohand>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

Bronze Alloy: 6
Steel Alloy: 3
ATK Scroll: 1
Forge Badge: 1
</Synthesis Ingredients>

A wand consisting of a metal and wood core coated

A steel staff with a green tint, due to its pure mana

Steel Alloy: 5
Elixir: 2
MDF Scroll: 1

</Synthesis Ingredients>

A partially restored form of the blade. Continue to

A sturdy and reliable shovel, useful for clearing

Wood: 1

A bow made using metal and wood. It allows the user
to attack at range, at the cost of arrows.
name: Hardwood Bow

Steel Alloy: 1
Wood: 5
</Synthesis Ingredients>

A simple pistol that does the job it's intended to
do. It's stronger than a bow, but the ammo is costly.
name: Pistol

Steel Alloy: 2
</Synthesis Ingredients>

A single-handed axe. It isn't as strong as a greatsword,
but it can be used with shields and can confuse enemies.

The knife is strangely beautiful. The silver handle has

name: Sacrificial Dagger

<Upgrade Slots: 2>
<Weapon Image: 229>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A sword pulsing with dark energy. It's hard to
look at, as light seems to nearly curve around it.
name: Shadowspec Sword

description:
An ancient gem created alongside the Overworld when high excess energy rapidly condensed.
\c[2]A strong foe has cursed this weapon. It rejects your hands. Vendors wouldn't dare accept it.\c[0]
